mapper.select: SELECT AVG(duration) AS average, STDDEV(duration) AS std_error FROM trips WHERE station_in IN (#{station1}, #{station2}) AND station_out IN (#{station1}, #{station2})

SELECT station.id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS cnt FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_in BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_in GROUP BY station.id ORDER BY station.id ASC

SELECT station.id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS cnt FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_out BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_out GROUP BY station.id ORDER BY station.id ASC

SELECT station.id, station.station_id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS flow FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_in BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_in GROUP BY station.id, station.station_id ORDER BY station.id ASC

SELECT station.id, station.station_id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS flow FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_out BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_out GROUP BY station.id, station.station_id ORDER BY station.id ASC

SELECT station.line_name AS line_name, COUNT( trips.id ) AS flow FROM trips RIGHT JOIN station ON trips.station_in = station.station_id WHERE ( trips.time_in BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) GROUP BY station.line_name ORDER BY station.line_name ASC

SELECT station.line_name AS line_name, COUNT( trips.id ) AS flow FROM trips RIGHT JOIN station ON trips.station_out = station.station_id WHERE ( trips.time_out BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) GROUP BY station.line_name ORDER BY station.line_name ASC

SELECT COUNT( trips.id ) AS cnt FROM trips WHERE trips.station_in IN ( SELECT station.station_id FROM station WHERE line_name = #{lineIn} ) AND trips.station_out IN ( SELECT station.station_id FROM station WHERE line_name = #{lineOut} ) AND ((trips.time_in BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) OR ( trips.time_out BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) )
